entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
